quote.msg: 比多4皮 imacpro打爆

i你老母
10萬蚊砌我條Threadripper 1950X list啦梗係

replies.msg:
CPU: AMD Ryzen Threadripper 1950X
RAM: G.SKILL Trident Z RGB for Ryzen 8x16GB DDR4-3200 C14
底板: ASUS ROG Zenith Extreme
顯示卡: ASUS ROG Poseidon 1080Ti x2
SSD: Samsung 960 Pro M.2 2TB (for OS)
ADATA SU900 2TB x2 (for Data)
火牛: Thermaltake Toughpower DPS G RGB 1250W Titanium
機箱: Corsair 900D

散熱系統:
水泵: EK-XRES 140 Revo D5 PWM
放水閘: EK-AF T-Splitter 3F G1/4
EK-AF Ball Valve (10mm) G1/4 - Black Nickel
EK-AF Extender Rotary M-M G1/4 x2
CPU水冷頭: EK Supremacy EVO
冷排: EK-CoolStream PE 360 (頂) + PE 480 (底側)
喉管: EK-DuraClear 9,5/12,7mm 3M RETAIL
fitting: EK-ACF Fitting 10/13mm x13 (水泵x2 + CPU冷頭x2 + 冷排x2x2 + 顯示卡x2x2 + 後備喉x1)
水冷液: EK-CryoFuel Clear Premix 900 mL
風扇: Noctua NF-F12 industrialPPC 3000rpm x19 (底入x8 + 底出x2 + 前入x3 + 頂出x6)
Noctua NF-A14 industrialPPC 3000rpm (後出)
